00038 #ifndef ZONE_LABEL
00039 #define ZONE_LABEL                                                              "ZONE"
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ARM_COMMAND_ID                                      0x00
00043 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_BYPASS_COMMAND_ID                                   0x01
00044 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_EMERGENCY_COMMAND_ID                                0x02
00045 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_FIRE_COMMAND_ID                                     0x03
00046 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_PANIC_COMMAND_ID                                    0x04
00047 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GET_ZONE_ID_MAP_COMMAND_ID                          0x05
00048 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GET_ZONE_INFORMATION_COMMAND_ID                     0x06
00049 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GET_PANEL_STATUS_COMMAND_ID                         0x07
00050 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GET_BYPASSED_ZONE_LIST_COMMAND_ID                   0x08
00051 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GET_ZONE_STATUS_COMMAND_ID                          0x09
00052 
00056 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ARM_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID                             0x00
00057 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GET_ZONE_ID_MAP_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID                 0x01
00058 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GET_ZONE_INFORMATION_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID            0x02
00059 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ZONE_STATUS_CHANGED_COMMAND_ID                      0x03
00060 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_PANEL_STATUS_CHANGED_COMMAND_ID                     0x04
00061 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GET_PANEL_STATUS_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID                0x05
00062 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_SET_BYPASSED_ZONE_LIST_COMMAND_ID                   0x06
00063 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_BYPASS_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID                          0x07
00064 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GET_ZONE_STATUS_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID                 0x08
00065 
00066 //Total of 19 Commands
00067 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT                                     0x13
00068 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_ARM_DISARM_CODE_SIZE                                        0x08
00069 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_MAP_ID_RESPONSE_SIZE                                        0x10
00070 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_ZONE_LABEL_SIZE                                             0x02
00071 
00075 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT                                   0x01
00076 
00080 #define ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID    CCPU_TO_LE16(0xfffd)
00081 
00084 /***************************************************************************/
00087 #define ZCL_DEFINE_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES() \
00088   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID)
00089     
00090 #define IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00091   { \
00092     .id = IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00093     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00094     .attributesAmount = ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00095     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes, \
00096     .commandsAmount = ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00097     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00098   }
00099 
00100 #define ZCL_DEFINE_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES() \
00101   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_GLOBAL_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID)
00102     
00103 #define IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00104   { \
00105     .id = IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ID, \
00106     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00107     .attributesAmount = ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00108     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes, \
00109     .commandsAmount = ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00110     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00111   }
00112 
00113 #define DEFINE_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00114     IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00115 
00116 /***************************************************************************/
00119 #define ZCL_DEFINE_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(aceArmCommandInd,\
00120                                             aceArmResponseCommandInd,\
00121                                             aceByPassCommandInd,\
00122                                             aceEmergencyCommandInd,\
00123                                             aceFireCommandInd,\
00124                                             acePanicCommandInd,\
00125                                             aceGetZoneIdMapCommandInd,\
00126                                             aceGetZoneIdMapResponseCommandInd,\
00127                                             aceGetZoneInformationCommandInd,\
00128                                             aceGetZoneInformationResponseCommandInd,\
00129                                             aceGetPanelStatusCommandInd,\
00130                                             aceGetPanelStatusCommandRespInd,\
00131                                             aceGetZoneStatusCommandInd,\
00132                                             aceGetZoneStatusRespCommandInd,\
00133                                             acePanelStatusChangedCommandInd,\
00134                                             aceZoneStatusChangedCommandInd,\
00135                                             aceGetByPassedZoneListCommandInd,\
00136                                             aceSetByPassedZoneListCommandInd,\
00137                                             aceByPassResponseCommandInd)\
00138     DEFINE_COMMAND(aceArmCommand, ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ARM_COMMAND_ID,\
00139                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\
00140                      aceArmCommandInd),\
00141     DEFINE_COMMAND(aceArmResponseCommand, ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ARM_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID,\
00142                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00143                      aceArmResponseCommandInd),\
00144     DEFINE_COMMAND(aceByPassCommand, ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_BYPASS_COMMAND_ID,\
00145                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\
00146                      aceByPassCommandInd),\
00147     DEFINE_COMMAND(aceEmergencyCommand, ZCL_IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_EMERGENCY_COMMAND_ID,\
00148                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\
00149                      aceEmergencyCommandInd),\

00151                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\
00152                      aceFireCommandInd),\

00154                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK),\

00201 typedef enum
00202 {
00203   ALL_ZONE_DISARMED = 0X00,
00204   ONLY_DAY_HOME_ZONES_ARMED = 0X01,
00205   ONLY_NIGHT_SLEEP_ZONES_ARMED = 0X02,
00206   ALL_ZONE_ARMED  = 0X03,
00207   INVALID_ARMCODE = 0x04,
00208   NOT_READY_TO_ARM_STATE = 0x05,
00209   ALREADY_DISARMED = 0x06
00210 } ZCL_ArmNotification_t;
00211 
00212 typedef enum
00213 {
00214   DISARM = 0x00,
00215   ARM_DAY_HOME_ZONES_ONLY = 0x01,
00216   ARM_NIGHT_SLEEP_ZONES_ONLY = 0x02,
00217   ARM_ALL_ZONES = 0x03
00218 }ZCL_ArmMode_t;
00219 
00220 typedef enum
00221 {
00222   AUTO_ENROLL_REQUEST_ENABLE = 0x00,
00223   AUTO_ENROLL_REQUEST_DISABLE = 0x01
00224 } ZCL_ZoneEnrolmentMethods_t;
00225 
00226 typedef enum
00227 {
00228   PANEL_DISARMED =0x00,
00229   ARMED_STAY = 0x01,
00230   ARMED_NIGHT = 0x02,
00231   ARMED_AWAY = 0x03,
00232   EXIT_DELAY = 0x04,
00233   ENTRY_DELAY = 0x05,
00234   NOT_READY_TO_ARM =0x06,
00235   IN_ALARM =0x07,
00236   ARMING_STAY = 0x08,
00237   ARMING_NIGHT = 0x09,
00238   ARMING_AWAY = 0x0A
00239 }ZCL_PanelStatus_t;
00240 
00241 typedef enum
00242 {
00243   MUTE =0x00,
00244   DEFAULT_SOUND = 0x01
00245 }ZCL_AudibleNotification_t;
00246 
00247 typedef enum
00248 {
00249   NO_ALARM =0x00,
00250   BURGLAR = 0x01,
00251   FIRE = 0X02,
00252   EMERGENCY = 0X03,
00253   POLICE_PANIC = 0X04,
00254   FIRE_PANIC = 0X05,
00255   EMERGENCY_PANIC = 0X06
00256 }ZCL_AlarmStatus_t;
00257   
00261 typedef enum
00262 {
00263   ZONE_BYPASSED = 0X00,
00264   ZONE_NOT_BYPASSED = 0X01,
00265   NOT_ALLOWED = 0X02,
00266   INVALID_ZONE_ID  = 0X03,
00267   UNKNOWN_ZONE_ID =0X04,
00268   INVALID_ARM_DISARM_CODE = 0X05
00269 } ZCL_BypassRespType_t;

00277 //Arm Commands
00278 typedef struct PACK
00279 {
00280   ZCL_ArmMode_t armMode;
00281   uint8_t lengthArmMode;
00282   char armDisarmCode[ZCL_IAS_ACE_ARM_DISARM_CODE_SIZE];
00283   uint8_t zoneId;  
00284 } ZCL_ACEArm_t;
00285 
00286 typedef struct PACK
00287 {
00288   ZCL_ArmNotification_t armMode;
00289 } ZCL_ACEResponseArm_t;
00290 
00291 //ByPass Command
00292 typedef struct PACK
00293 {
00294   uint16_t  getZoneIdMapResponse[ZCL_IAS_ACE_MAP_ID_RESPONSE_SIZE];
00295 } ZCL_GetZoneIdMapResponse_t;
00296 
00297 //ZoneId Information Commands
00298 typedef struct PACK
00299 {
00300   uint8_t  zoneId;
00301 } ZCL_GetZoneInformationCommand_t;
00302 
00303 typedef struct PACK
00304 {
00305   uint8_t  zoneId;
00306   uint16_t zoneType;
00307   uint64_t zoneAddress;
00308   uint8_t length;
00309   uint8_t  zoneLabel[sizeof(ZONE_LABEL)];
00310 } ZCL_GetZoneInformationResp_t;
00311 
00312 typedef struct PACK
00313 {
00314   uint8_t zoneId;
00315   uint8_t armDisarmCode[ZCL_IAS_ACE_ARM_DISARM_CODE_SIZE];
00316 }bypassList_t;
00317 
00318 //Panel Status Commands
00319 typedef struct PACK
00320 {
00321   ZCL_PanelStatus_t panel_status;
00322   uint8_t seconds_remaining;
00323 } ZCL_AcePanelStatusChangeCommand_t;
00324 
00325 typedef struct PACK
00326 {
00327  ZCL_PanelStatus_t panel_status;
00328  uint8_t seconds_remain;
00329  ZCL_AudibleNotification_t audible_noti;
00330  ZCL_AlarmStatus_t alarmstatus; 
00331 }ZCL_ACEGetPanelStatusCommandResp_t;
00332 
00333 //GetZone Status Commands
00334 typedef struct PACK
00335 {
00336   uint8_t starting_zone_id;
00337   uint8_t max_number_zoneids;
00338   uint8_t zonestatus_maskflag;
00339   uint16_t zonestatus_mask; 
00340 }ZCL_ACEGetZoneStatusCommand_t;
00341 
00342 //Get Panel Status Commands
00343 typedef struct PACK
00344 {
00345   ZCL_PanelStatus_t panel_status;
00346   uint8_t seconds_remaining;
00347   ZCL_AudibleNotification_t audible_noti;
00348   ZCL_AlarmStatus_t alarmstatus;   
00349 }ZCL_ACEPanelStatusChangedCommand_t;
00350 
00351 //Get Zone CHANGED Command
00352 typedef struct PACK
00353 {
00354   uint8_t zoneid;
00355   uint16_t zoneStatus;
00356   ZCL_AudibleNotification_t audible_noti;
00357   uint8_t zoneLength;
00358   char zoneLabel[sizeof(ZONE_LABEL)];
00359 }ZCL_ACEZoneStatusChangedCommand_t;
00360 
00361 END_PACK

00363 // IAS ACE Cluster Commands
00364 typedef struct
00365 {
00366   struct
00367   {
00368     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00369     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00370     ZCL_Status_t(*aceArmCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_ACEArm_t *payload);
00371   } aceArmCommand;
00372   
00373   struct
00374   {
00375     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00376     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00377     ZCL_Status_t (*aceArmResponseCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_ACEResponseArm_t *payload);
00378   } aceArmResponseCommand;
00379 
00380   struct
00381   {
00382     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00383     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00384     ZCL_Status_t(*aceByPassCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t *payload);
00385   } aceByPassCommand;  
00386   
00387   struct
00388   {
00389     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00390     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00391     ZCL_Status_t(*aceEmergencyCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing);
00392   } aceEmergencyCommand;
00393 
00394   struct
00395   {
00396     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00397     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00398     ZCL_Status_t(*aceFireCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing);
00399   } aceFireCommand;
00400 
00401   struct
00402   {
00403     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00404     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00405     ZCL_Status_t(*acePanicCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing);
00406   } acePanicCommand;
00407 
00408   struct
00409   {
00410     ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00411     ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00412     ZCL_Status_t(*aceGetZoneIdMapCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing);
00413   } aceGetZoneIdMapCommand;
00414 
00415   struct
00416   {
00417     ZCL_CommandId_t id;

00419     ZCL_Status_t (*aceGetZoneIdMapResponseCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_GetZoneIdMapResponse_t *payload);
00420   } aceGetZoneIdMapResponseCommand;
00421

00500 BEGIN_PACK
00501 typedef struct PACK
00502 {
00503   struct PACK
00504   {
00505     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00506     uint8_t             type;
00507     uint8_t             properties;
00508     uint16_t            value;
00509   } clusterVersion;
00510 } ZCL_IasAceClusterServerAttributes_t;
00511 END_PACK
00512 
00513 BEGIN_PACK
00514 typedef struct PACK
00515 {
00516   struct PACK
00517   {
00518     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;
00519     uint8_t             type;
00520     uint8_t             properties;
00521     uint16_t            value;
00522   } clusterVersion;
00523 } ZCL_IasAceClusterClientAttributes_t;
00524 END_PACK
